title: Hour 2 - BJ Armstrong (04-03-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - BJ Armstrong (04-03-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and the guys explain why they have serious doubts about the NBA's ability to finish the season out in a centralized location like Las Vegas, debate whether or not LeBron James is trying to upstage Michael Jordan by teasing his own video breakdown, and discuss if Dez Bryant has any realistic shot of getting back into the NFL. Plus, 3x NBA champion BJ Armstrong discusses playing with Jordan and his own involvement in the upcoming 'Last Dance' documentary

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
